name: Blue Sheep
description: Blue sheep is a Platformer Adventure set in a strange world, plagued by the physical manifestation of misery, known as the Beast. Play as the Outsider, experiencing the memories of a warrior who once opposed the Beast.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: 3.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: 3.4 GHz  Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 950 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
